bankTransferDescription: You can donate via bank transfer to the following account. Please use the reference "Donation" and your Discord username so we can allocate your donation correctly.
paypalDescription: You can donate through PayPal by clicking the button below. You will be redirected to the PayPal website.
creditcard: Credit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, GiroPay, Sofort
creditcardDescription: You can donate with credit card or other payment services by clicking the button below. You will be redirected to Stripe, our payment provider.
disclaimer: Please note, that BuildTheEarth Germany e.V. is no charitable organization and therefore donations are not tax-deductible.
scan: Scan this code with your banking app
